summary: Experienced educator and program administrator with a track record of curriculum development, assessment implementation, professional development leadership, and volunteer program management. Skilled in literacy and ELA standards, data-driven instruction, and community partnerships.

experience.title: Cole County Service Unit Manager, Community Involvement & Professional Development
experience.company: Girl Scouts of the Missouri Heartland
experience.description: Involvement & professional development; create engaging organizational training materials; identify and develop service learning activities; promote materials; coordinate volunteer managers and troops; liaise with statewide office; supervise and support volunteers; 82 troops, 153 volunteers serving 800+ youth; troubleshoot complaints.

experience.title: Camp Director, Summer Twilight Camp
experience.company: Girl Scouts of the Missouri Heartland
experience.description: Plan curriculum and learning objectives; develop streamlined registration processes and schedules; facilitate regular volunteer meetings; foster positive relationships with local media, vendors, and allied agencies; engage in public relations/marketing; oversee volunteer managers; monitor camp operations and camper/staff safety.

experience.title: Studio Manager
experience.description: Choreographed routines; coordinated performances; taught performing company; trained and evaluated studio staff; tracked student accounts; communicated with families to answer questions and resolve conflicts.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Curriculum development; utilize formative/summative assessment data; implement district-level educational programs including Balanced Literacy/Guided Reading, Lucy Calkins Writing, Investigations Mathematics, and Sitton Spelling; lead professional development; implement Positive Behavior Support; align ELA curriculum with Common Core; coach and support AFL practices; build-level staff development; transition to standards-based grading; engage stakeholders.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: District grade level chair; leadership academy; collaborate with administrators; develop and revise curriculum; score MAP assessments in areas of Communication Arts and Mathematics.

education.degree: Master of Education in Educational Leadership and Policy Analysis
Bachelor of Science in Elementary Education

certifications: DESE Initial Administration Certification, Principal K-8: Curriculum Leadership (December 2014)
DESE Elementary 1-6 Certification, Spanish K-9, Middle School Language Arts
